title: How can I update my mobile number for my GGives account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Am I allowed to cancel my GGives loan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31107573349401-Am-I-allowed-to-cancel-my-GGives-loan)
- [How can I update my mobile number for my GGives account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408119355417-How-can-I-update-my-mobile-number-for-my-GGives-account)
- [How do I delete my GGives account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30751581796377-How-do-I-delete-my-GGives-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To update your GCash-registered number with GGives, make sure your new number is **[fully verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC)** first. Once it's verified, [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=ggives__i_want_to_change_my_ggives_mobile_number.) A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours**.

Once it is processed by our representative, please wait **24 hours** for your new details to reflect in your GGives account.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I pay for my GGives dues?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4405187569817)
- [Am I allowed to cancel my GGives loan?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31107573349401)
- [How do I delete my GGives account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30751581796377)
